trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException"></xref> class is an exception thrown when converting data using a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConverter"></xref> object.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException.#ctor"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException"></xref> class.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException.#ctor(System.String)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException"></xref> class using the specified message.
The message displayed to the client when the exception is thrown.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException"></xref> class using the specified serialization data and streaming contextual data.
The serialized object data about the exception thrown.
The contextual data about the source or destination.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException"></xref> class using the specified message and inner exception.
The message displayed when the exception is thrown.
The <xref href="System.Exception.InnerException"></xref>, if any, that threw the exception.
